item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Math Typesetting

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! I am Shubham Gandhi .I am a final year computer science undergrad. I am Software Enginner.I am also FOSS and Blockchain enthusiast.I have experience in Database Designing,Microservice Architecture and Implementing REST APIs.This Summer I worked with Seaflux,Ahmedabad as Node.JS intern.I am also Incoming Associate Software Enginner üñ• at Jeavio,Vadodra. I have worked on JavaScript and it’s various framework, I am comfortable with Docker ,Kubernetes ,Node.JS and git. I look forward to learn more on my way.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Implemented Blockchain in JavaScript Implemented the complete Blockchain from scratch in JavaScript. Implemented proof of work Implemented Consensus Algorithm based on longest chain rule Built a Block Explorer to explore the blocks Decentralized Lottery System Implemented Decentralized Lottery system using Ethereum’s smart contract. Tested the contract using ganache and mocha Deployed the contract on Rinkeby Test Network Implemented front-end in React Used Web3 to interact with the contract
